events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund because the customer requests money back due to receiving the wrong product.
A customer service agent has been assigned to assist with the refund request for the incorrect item shipped.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the wrong item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund promptly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing that the item is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund immediately and you do not need to return the wrong item.
That sounds great, thank you for handling this so quickly and not requiring me to send the item back.
Your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount reflected in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since we have not heard back, we're closing this refund case. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
